nodes.name: Definition of threatSituation
nodes.fol: (forall (s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (iff (threatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (exists (s1 e3) (and (ecs s a)(member e0 s1)(eventualitiesOf s1 s) (causallyInvolved e0 e)(branch e e1 e2 s) (imply e1 e3)(not' e3 g)(goal g a) (not (imply e2 e3))))))
nodes.english: s is a threat situation for agent a with respect to situation e0, involving an envisioned branch e to alternatives e1 and e2, where one alternative e1 leads to the negation of a goal g and the other e2 does not

nodes.name: Definition of threat in situation
nodes.fol: (forall (s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (if (threatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g)(threat e1 a s)))
nodes.english: e1 is the threat to agent a in situation s

nodes.name: Definition of threat0
nodes.fol: (forall (e1 a) (iff (threat0 e1 a)(exists (s)(threat e1 a s))))
nodes.english: e1 is a threat to a in some threat situation

nodes.name: Definition of goalInThreat
nodes.fol: (forall (s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (if (threatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g)(goalInThreat g a s)))
nodes.english: g is the goal of a's that is threatened by situation s

nodes.name: Definition of threatCondition
nodes.fol: (forall (s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (if (threatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (threatCondition e a s)))
nodes.english: The envisioned branch point e is the threat condition

nodes.name: Definition of realThreatSituation
nodes.fol: (forall (s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (iff (realThreatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (and (threatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g)(cwu s a) (Rexist e0))))
nodes.english: A threat situation is real if the envisioned causal system is the current world understanding and the anchor e0 really exists

nodes.name: Definition of possibleThreat
nodes.fol: (forall (e1 a c) (iff (possibleThreat e1 a c) (exists (s e0 e e2 g) (and (realThreatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (possible e1 c)))))
nodes.english: A possible threat arises in a real threat situation where the threat e1 is possible with respect to constraints c

nodes.name: Definition of impossibleThreat
nodes.fol: (forall (e1 a c) (iff (impossibleThreat e1 a c) (exists (s e0 e e2 g) (and (realThreatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (not (possible e1 c))))))
nodes.english: An impossible threat arises in a real threat situation where the threat e1 is impossible with respect to constraints c

nodes.name: Definition of realizedThreat
nodes.fol: (forall (e1 a) (iff (realizedThreat e1 a) (exists (s a e0 e e2 g e3 t1 t2) (and (realThreatSituation' e3 s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (atTime e3 t1)(atTime e1 t2)(before t1 t2)))))
nodes.english: A threat is realized if there was a threat situation at time t1 and the threat e1 actually occurred at a later time t2

nodes.name: Definition of unrealizedThreat
nodes.fol: (forall (e1 a) (iff (unrealizedThreat e1 a) (exists (s a e0 e e2 g e3 t1) (and (realThreatSituation' e3 s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (atTime e3 t1) (not (exists (t2) (and (atTime e1 t2)(before t1 t2))))))))
nodes.english: A threat is unrealized if there is no subsequent time t2 at which the threat actually occurs

nodes.name: Definition of threatDetection
nodes.fol: (forall (s1 s a) (iff (threatDetection s1 s a) (exists (e0 e e1 e2 g) (and (ecsSeq s1 a)(last s s1) (threatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g)))))
nodes.english: s1 is the process of detecting threat situation s by agent a through an envisioning sequence

nodes.name: Threat detection ability
nodes.fol: (forall (a) (if (person a) (exists (s1 s c) (and (able a s1 c)(threatDetection s1 s a)))))
nodes.english: People have an ability to detect threats

nodes.name: Definition of threatDetectionFailure
nodes.fol: (forall (a s1 s) (iff (threatDetectionFailure a s1 s) (and (fail a s1)(threatDetection s1 s a))))
nodes.english: People can fail to identify a threat

nodes.name: Definition of concern
nodes.fol: (forall (x a) (iff (concern x a) (exists (e3 e1 c) (and (believe a e3)(possibleThreat' e3 e1 a c) (arg* x e1)))))
nodes.english: To be concerned about something x is to believe there is a possible threat e1 involving x

nodes.name: Definition of biasAgainstRisk
nodes.fol: (forall (a) (iff (biasAgainstRisk a) (forall (e3 s e0 e e1 e2 g) (if (and (threatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (concern' e3 e1 a)(agentOf a e0)) (exists (e4 e5 c) (and (likely e4 c)(cwu c a)(cause' e4 e3 e5) (not' e5 e0)))))))
nodes.english: Agent a has a bias against risk if concerns about threats likely cause a to refrain from risky actions

nodes.name: Definition of biasTowardRisk
nodes.fol: (forall (a) (iff (biasTowardRisk a) (forall (e3 s e0 e e1 e2 g) (if (and (threatSituation s a e0 e e1 e2 g) (concern' e3 e1 a)(agentOf a e0)) (exists (e4 e5 c) (and (not (likely e4 c))(cwu c a) (cause' e4 e3 e5)(not' e5 e0)))))))
nodes.english: Agent a has a bias toward risk if concerns about threats are not likely to cause a to refrain from risky actions

nodes.name: Definition of addThreat
nodes.fol: (forall (a e1) (iff (addThreat a e1) (exists (e3) (and (changeTo e3)(concern' e3 e1 a)))))
nodes.english: When threats are identified, they are added to those that the agent is concerned with

nodes.name: Definition of removeThreat
nodes.fol: (forall (a e1) (iff (removeThreat a e1) (exists (e3) (and (changeFrom e3)(concern' e3 e1 a)))))
nodes.english: When threats are no longer a concern, they are removed

nodes.name: Definition of seriousnessScale
nodes.fol: (forall (s a) (iff (seriousnessScale s a) (exists (s1 s2) (and (likelihoodScale s1)(importanceScale s2 a) (compositeScale s s1 s2) (forall (e1 x) (if (at e1 x s)(threat0 e1 a)))))))
nodes.english: The seriousness scale is a composite of likelihood and importance scales, with threats as elements

nodes.name: Definition of moreSerious'
nodes.fol: (forall (e e1 e2 a) (iff (moreSerious' e e1 e2 a) (exists (s s1) (and (seriousnessScale s a)(scaleDefinedBy s s1 e)))))
nodes.english: e is the eventuality of one threat e1 being more serious than threat e2 to agent a

nodes.name: Definition of serious'
nodes.fol: (forall (e e1 a) (iff (serious' e e1 a) (exists (s) (and (seriousnessScale s a)(scaleFor s e)))))
nodes.english: e is the eventuality of threat e1 being serious to agent a (in the Hi region of the scale)

nodes.name: Definition of seriousness
nodes.fol: (forall (x e1 a) (iff (seriousness x e1 a) (exists (s) (and (seriousnessScale s a)(at e1 x s)))))
nodes.english: x is the seriousness measure of threat e1 to agent a (its place in the scale)

nodes.name: Definition of assessThreat
nodes.fol: (forall (a e1) (iff (assessThreat a e1) (exists (x e3 e4 d) (and (try a e3)(changeTo' e3 e4)(know' e4 a d) (seriousness' d x e1 a)))))
nodes.english: To assess a threat is to try to come to know the seriousness of the threat

node_types.variable: Frequently used variables (2+ axioms in chapter)
